feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:46 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 09:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
